DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy long-term treatment 2 mg aflibercept via different intravitreal ( IVT ) treatment regimens subject DME pretreated 2 mg aflibercept every 8 week 5 initial monthly injection approximately 1 year ( accord EU label first year treatment )
